SongLyrics.JpnStr: 例[たと]えば今[いま]君[きみ]が その瞳[ひとみ]濡[ぬ]らしていたとしても
SongLyrics.EngStr: For example, even if you are now wetting your eyes with tears.

SongLyrics.JpnStr: 呼[よ]ぶ声[こえ]はもう聞[き]こえない
SongLyrics.EngStr: Your calling voice can no longer be heard.

SongLyrics.JpnStr: 絵[え]の具[ぐ]を溶[と]かす様[よう]に 君[きみ]との日々[ひび]は記憶[きおく]の中[なか] 滲[にじ]んでく
SongLyrics.EngStr: Like dissolving paint, the days with you blur in my memory.

SongLyrics.JpnStr: 何[なに]かを求[もと]めれば何[なに]かがこぼれ落[お]ちてく
SongLyrics.EngStr: If you seek something, something else will fall away.

SongLyrics.JpnStr: そんなこの世界[せかい]で
SongLyrics.EngStr: In such a world as this.

SongLyrics.JpnStr: 春[はる]の風[かぜ]を待[ま]つあの花[はな]の様[よう]に
SongLyrics.EngStr: Like that flower waiting for the spring wind.

SongLyrics.JpnStr: 君[きみ]という光[ひかり]があるのなら
SongLyrics.EngStr: If there is a light called 'you.'

SongLyrics.JpnStr: 巡[めぐ]り巡[めぐ]る運命[うんめい]を超[こ]えて
SongLyrics.EngStr: Beyond the ever-revolving destiny.

SongLyrics.JpnStr: 咲[さ]かせるさ 愛[あい]の花[はな]を 花束[はなたば]を
SongLyrics.EngStr: I'll make it bloom, the flower of love, a bouquet.

SongLyrics.JpnStr: 願[ねが]いが叶[かな]うのなら 二[ふた]人[り]の世界[せかい]また生[い]きてみたい
SongLyrics.EngStr: If my wish could come true, I'd want to live in our world again.

SongLyrics.JpnStr: あのキスから芽吹[めぶ]く日々[ひび]
SongLyrics.EngStr: From that kiss, the days start to sprout.

SongLyrics.JpnStr: 水色[みずいろ]花[はな]びらはもう香[かお]りを忘[わす]れ 君[きみ]への想[おも]い 枯[か]れていく
SongLyrics.EngStr: The pale blue petals have lost their fragrance, and my feelings for you are withering.

SongLyrics.JpnStr: 散[ち]ってしまいそうな心[こころ]に覚[おぼ]えたての愛[あい]の美[うつく]しさを
SongLyrics.EngStr: To the heart that seems to be falling apart, I remember the beauty of fresh love.

SongLyrics.JpnStr: ねえ 咲[さ]かせて
SongLyrics.EngStr: Hey, let it bloom.

SongLyrics.JpnStr: 春[はる]の風[かぜ]を待[ま]つあの花[はな]の様[よう]に
SongLyrics.EngStr: Like that flower waiting for the spring wind.

SongLyrics.JpnStr: 飾[かざ]らない心[こころ]でいられたら
SongLyrics.EngStr: If only I could stay with an unadorned heart.

SongLyrics.JpnStr: 触[ふ]れられなくても
SongLyrics.EngStr: Even if I can't touch you.

SongLyrics.JpnStr: 想[おも]い煩[わずら]っても
SongLyrics.EngStr: Even if I worry about these feelings.

SongLyrics.JpnStr: 忘[わす]れないよ
SongLyrics.EngStr: I won't forget.

SongLyrics.JpnStr: この恋[こい]を一[ひと]つずつ束[たば]ねいて
SongLyrics.EngStr: I'll bundle this love one by one.

SongLyrics.JpnStr: 君[きみ]という光[ひかり]があるのなら
SongLyrics.EngStr: If there is a light called 'you.'

SongLyrics.JpnStr: 巡[めぐ]り巡[めぐ]る運命[うんめい]を超[こ]えて
SongLyrics.EngStr: Beyond the ever-revolving destiny.

SongLyrics.JpnStr: 咲[さ]かせるさ 愛[あい]の花[はな]を 花束[はなたば]を
SongLyrics.EngStr: I'll make it bloom, the flower of love, a bouquet.

ListVocab: こぼれ落ちる-こぼれおちる
巡り巡る-めぐりめぐる
